title.narrative: Zm: Increased Access to Electricity Services

description.narrative: The objective of this project is to increase access to electricity services and improve efficiency and quality of the electricity distribution system in targeted areas.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :PAD (C.6) | Description :GOZ has established the Project Steering Committee, with a composition and terms ofreference satisfactory to the Association | Due Date :20-Jan-2009

Finance Agreement :PAD (C.6) | Description :GoZ has entered into subsidiary loan agreement with ZESCO and subsidiary Grantagreement with REA, in form and substance satisfactor y to the association | Due Date :20-Jan-2009

Finance Agreement :PAD (C.6) | Description :ZESCO and the Recipient will commence implementation of the agreed ZESCO PerformanceImprovement Plan by no later than December, 201 0, in a manner satisfactory to the association | Due Date :31-Dec-2010
